Attempting to manually re-create all_data2022 without excluding so many people (hoping to get some patients in common with RBC dataset)

```{r}
library(survival)
library(tidyverse)
library(rio)
library(survminer)
library(haven)
library(survRM2)

rbc_data <- read_sas('dr281_l_rbcfa_2008_m_0420s_v1.sas7bdat') %>% 
  mutate(ranid = as.integer(ranid, na.rm = TRUE))

thromboxane_data <- read_sas('datasets_copy/dr281_l_thrmbxn_ex08_1b_1068.sas7bdat')

creatinine1 <- read_dta("datasets_copy/dr281_l_il6_2008_m_0433s_v1.dta")
creatinine2 <- read_dta("datasets_copy/dr281_fhslab1_8s.dta")

isoprostane <- read_dta("datasets_copy/dr281_l_isopros_2008_m_0512s_v1.dta")

aspirin <- read_dta("datasets_copy/dr281_e_exam_ex03_7_0426s.dta") %>% 
  select(ranid, h010) %>% 
  rename(H010 = "h010")

ejection_fraction <- read_dta("datasets_copy/dr281_t_echo_2008_m_0549s_v1.dta") %>% 
  select(ranid, LVFEJFR, x35, sdate)

mortality <- read_dta("datasets_copy/dr281_vr_dates_2019_a_1175s.dta") %>% 
  select(ranid, idtype, sex, date3, date8, date4, date9)

event_data <- read_sas('datasets_copy/dr281_vr_soe_2020_a_1340s.sas7bdat')

labs <- read_dta("datasets_copy/dr281_l_fhslab_ex03_7_0267s.dta")

race_egfr <- read_sas('datasets_copy/dr281_vr_raceall_2008_a_0712s.sas7bdat')

## looking for the egfr dataset
```
